content: Build email waterfall in cheap-to-expensive order (Prospeo → Hunter → DropContact → Datagma → PDL)
Set up 'Only Run If email is blank' conditional logic
Test waterfall in Sandbox Mode on 4 Florida prospects
Production: Enrich 20 Florida prospects for Travis (40 credits = $2.98)
Connect OpenAI API to Clay (BYO-API for 97% savings)
